scripts.build: yarn && yarn run add:components && yarn bootstrap && yarn run:build && yarn lint
scripts.lint: yarn eslint && yarn stylelint && yarn prettier:write
scripts.ci:publish:prerelease: lerna publish prerelease --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish prerelease version'
scripts.ci:publish:patch: lerna publish patch --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish patch version'
scripts.ci:publish:minor: lerna publish minor --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish minor version'
scripts.ci:publish:major: lerna publish major --yes --no-verify-access --message 'chore(release): publish major version'
